PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-01942022-03-03,  IRCC,  ,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations (Excessive Demand)
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS (EXCESSIVE DEMAND) in order to (1) increase the excessive demand cost threshold for foreign nationals seeking to come to Canada on a temporary or permanent basis; (2) eliminate the exceptional period of 10 years from excessive demand calculations for cost of health and social services; (3) redefine “health services” and “social services” to provide clarity and remove reference to certain social services; and (4) clarify which officers are responsible for reviewing medical and non-medical information submitted by applicants in the context of excessive demand assessments.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0039 Publication Date: 2022-03-16
AttachmentsAttachment
